internalFormatHint

protected int internalFormatHint
The desired image format for the graphics card. This is only a hint.

format

protected final int format
The image data format.

width

protected final int width
The image width.

height

protected final int height
The image height.

dataBuffers

protected ByteBuffer[] dataBuffers
The byte buffers for the image data.

Method Detail

getByteBuffer

public final ByteBuffer getByteBuffer(int index)
Get the image byte buffer, you use it in the GL.texImage2D() call.

getFormat

public final int getFormat()
Get the image format. This is the format in which the data is specified.

getInternalFormatHint

public final int getInternalFormatHint()
Get the internal image format. This is a format hint for the graphic driver.

setInternalFormatHint

public final void setInternalFormatHint(int internalFormatHint)
Sets the desired internal format. Setting a internal format that is incompatible is no error, this method ensures that the internal format is always compatible with the data format.

getPixelProcessor

public PixelProcessor getPixelProcessor()

getWidth

public final int getWidth()
Get the image width

getHeight

public final int getHeight()
Get the image height

hasAlpha

public final boolean hasAlpha()
Returns true if the ImageComponent contains explicit alpha data. This does not count for compressed formats.

isCompressed

public final boolean isCompressed()
Returns true if the ImageComponent contains compressed data.

isInternalFormatHintCompressed

public final boolean isInternalFormatHintCompressed()
Returns true if the image should be stroed in compressed form on the graphics card.

calucateNeededImageSize

protected final int calucateNeededImageSize()
